title: "Cherokee tribes voice joint opposition to recognition for Lumbee, other tribes"
excerpt: "Tri-Council session held Thursday, June 23, the three Cherokee tribes agreed unanimously to a resolution opposing state and federal recognition of groups they say erroneously claim Cherokee identity."
